thread.title: Rest in peace: Travel journalist Cristina Ambrosini

author: eTN Editor
title: Rest in peace: Travel journalist Cristina Ambrosini
text:
Rest in peace: Travel journalist Cristina Ambrosini   
By Mario Masciullo, eTN Italy Correspondent | Aug 27, 2015 Cristina Ambrosini / Photo © Mario Masciullo eTN   
ITALY (eTN) - The Italian media and travel enterprise community is deeply saddened by the news of the demise of travel trade journalist Cristina Ambrosini. 
Cristina’s young life ended due to a fatal accident. 
She was the CEO of the first-ever Italian travel trade journal, “L'Agenzia di Viaggi,” that was founded by her father, Marco Aurelio, back in 1965. 
Cristina was well known in the world travel community due to her regular attendance at international travel marts, including the USA’s Pow Wow in particular, as this event occurred in the land of her roots. 
We will always remember Cristina, not only as an excellent journalist, but also as a cheerful, mild, and wonderful human being. 
Our heartfelt condolences go out to her family and all on the L'Agenzia di Viaggi team. 
"What we have once enjoyed, we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes part of us." - Helen Keller
